string.text: Thugs, bitches, led me to the old factory. Don't know what I was going to do, but the guy took back to me, I never saw.\nthey still HAVE one of our Serge. He is being held in the basement of the building... there is... a big, unfinished. Help him, okay? And then they also...
Don't know what they have there at the factory?

I have heard very little. I only know that Hog, plow theirs, is part of the key from the entrance to the cave that is there. The laboratory there used to be some kind of something... Else they talked about Hog would really like to get there, but without the second part of the key to hell that goes.\nIt... if you go to there heads is not recommended. Bandyukov full.
Clear. Thanks, I will consider.
Try to help your guy.
My partner is a pity... a good friend was. But still I owe you.
Happen.
Thanks for the help!
Yet.
You people wanted chhat... what I talk to you?
Thank you, brother! Rescued my companion. Here, take my heart.
Agreed.
You probably know these places well. What's up here?
To the North is a camp of bandits. To the East of the old factory. In the South-West - abandoned pig farm, and near it a gate of some kind... don't even know what's in there, didnt go for them.
Can about a camp of bandits in more detail?
Well, what more... they Settled in this unfinished building directly to the North of here. They Hog - beast, what to look for. We here sent to kill.
What's the factory going?
What managed to find out is that there is a entrance to some underground room. Only protect his gangster great.
Dungeon what? What's inside?
What I do not know, do not know we are there not to meddle. The only - known that the Hog is half of the key from the entrance.
A real pig farm? And pig is there?

Mouth water, chops wanted, right? So throughout the Area are wild boars running around! Eat this - I see you glow in the dark, the flashlight is not needed! Okay, kidding, kidding... Farm long abandoned, there are some stalkers settled. Only they did not like me, and I trust my gut to used.
And what of the gate?
Yes I do not understand something. Gate as the gate closed and protected well. We did not owl.
Got it, thanks.
You're welcome! You're welcome.
In exploration, just the two of us?
Another one was, Serge. I don't know where he went, heard nothing... Guess his gang of sewn still.
Happily.
Oh, friend... my friend, as am I now?.. Thank you, brother - at least you tried to help. And I keep my word.
Thanks for the help! What do you want to know more?
You refused to help when I asked. Get out of here, not talk about us...
Yet.
Hey, friend! Help! I spy "Debt". Help to get out!..
I will try.
Nothing I can do to help.

Thank you, brother! I owe you one. Look what I learned - might come in handy, you never know... the Hog is their ringleader - got himself a lot of good. He has part of the key of the dungeon in the old factory. My guards talked about there used to be some kind of laboratory was. Only to get to the Hog is not easy.
Thanks for the info.
It's time to get out to her. It would be nice to leave here alive...
Good luck.
I should go out, and the mob can accidentally look! Like what? Be quick!..
No, nothing.
Hey, friend! There on the wall is a switch - it opens the door grille.
Well, I'll see.

Hey, great gun? I found something near Amber... the stash was there, in one word. Among all there gaussova lay. Great, you report thing for a hundred meters of any spot. Can give if interested. Eight just two minutes away!
Here's the money.
No thanks, don't want to.
Yes it is not necessary. With money strained.
Got the money? Only hurry up, and then I was asked... to come Soon.
Great. Wait here, I'll handle it.
Wait.
Dude, give first aid kit!
Here you go.
Sorry, I have no kits.

Thank you, friend, you rescued me, no words. If alive will still happen to see you - I will try your debt back. Now is that the information is interesting to share work. So, South of here, a farm there free stalkers settled. So, one of them sells Gauss quite cheaply for eight. I was going to buy, and you - to get on such a hit... So, if you have the Moolah, go for it.
Thanks for the info.
I owe a debt I return. Go.
Great. Now we are going to rock it.
Sorry, I have other plans.
Well, good luck then.
Yet.
I'm from the Bartender...
I am aware of. Here you go. You're here for that?
Yeah, that's what. Thank you.
I want to join the bandits.
Sure?
And then?
Well then, in short keep the kit, and welcome.
Sorry, I changed my mind.
Too early to market.
Yes, you frostbitten on his head. You lads party bypasses. First prove that you are with the concepts.
Clear...
